It was a very fruitful event for us at FLS Group as the Platinum Sponsor of the signature XLProjects Annual General Meeting 2022. During three days of networking and one-on-one meetings, we were delighted to welcome industry professionals, agents and partners to the future of global supply chains with our interconnected, bespoke solutions.<\/p>","saveContent":"

\u201cAt this event, we are proud to show how we take a greater role in the value chain, thanks to our recent business expansions. With FLS <\/a>Projects at the centre of our expertise, we now also offer the same high-quality, bespoke services through FLS Logistics, FLS Warehousing, FLS Trading, and of course, our new FLS Chartering Desk.\u201d - Our CEO, TORBJ\u00d6RN LARISCH, shared about this event.<\/p>","saveContent":"

wpPost.title: Proudly sponsor the XLP AGM 2022

seo.title: Proudly sponsor the XLP AGM 2022 - FLS
seo.metaDesc: During three days of networking, we were delighted to welcome industry professionals, agents and partners to the future of global supply chains.
seo.opengraphTitle: Proudly sponsor the XLP AGM 2022 - FLS
seo.opengraphDescription: During three days of networking, we were delighted to welcome industry professionals, agents and partners to the future of global supply chains.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: It was a very fruitful event for us at FLS Group as the Platinum Sponsor of the signature XLProjects Annual General Meeting 2022. During three days of networking and one-on-one meetings, we were delighted to welcome industry professionals, agents and partners to the future of global supply chains with our interconnected, bespoke solutions.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: “At this event, we are proud to show how we take a greater role in the value chain, thanks to our recent business expansions. With FLS Projects at the centre of our expertise, we now also offer the same high-quality, bespoke services through FLS Logistics, FLS Warehousing, FLS Trading, and of course, our new FLS Chartering Desk.” - Our CEO, TORBJÖRN LARISCH, shared about this event.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: Click through to see exciting moments from XLP 2022.
